Header: Awareness Workshop on 'Suicide prevention' Held for MLT Troops
Content: A team of medical experts at the Directorate of Preventive Medicine and Mental Health in the Army, including Colonel R. M. M Monaragala, Major U. P Mallawaarachchi, Captain S. M. P. K Samarakoon, Lieutenant P. A. C. P. K Peduruarachchi and Lieutenant K. P. K Anthony educated Mullaittivu troops on 'Suicide Prevention and Reduction of Mental stress' on Wednesday (6). Troops of 59, 64 & 68 Division HQs and under command establishments of the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu joined the workshop at the SFHQ- Mullaittivu auditorium. 247 troops including 40 Officers attended the workshop.
